lead_paragraph: The wife of Russian tycoon Dmitry Rybolovlev has won a $4.5 billion divorce settlement in a Geneva court, Swiss media reported on Monday.

headline.main: Swiss Court Grants $4.5 Billion Divorce to Russian Tycoon's Wife
headline.print_headline: Swiss Court Grants $4.5 Billion Divorce to Russian Tycoon's Wife

snippet: The wife of Russian tycoon Dmitry Rybolovlev has won a $4.5 billion divorce settlement in a Geneva court, Swiss media reported on Monday....
